member: At EPknoT, experts with various background together with extensive shipping and financial knowledge are here to assist you.
alliance: We entered into a strategic alliance to form SYLAN Group with companies that shares common values to grow together. Through alliance network, we deliver extensive market network and business deals to our clients.
culture: At EPknoT, we work based on three key values. All our work is in alignment with these values to provide best in class excellent services.
enjoy: Work should be fun and this fosters better teamwork and motivate all employees to deliver client excellence.
professional: We deliver the best in class services with accurate information.
transformation: We continue to transform ourselves to reflect new environment to come.
